name: AVATA Network
public_notice: The smart-contract owner can mint new tokens, please proceed with caution.
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: AVATA Network is a comprehensive Defi platform that integrates launchpad, AMM DEX & lending protocol on Avalanche. Community can join IDO, swap token, or even earning passive incomes through dedicated application across our platforms.
